meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The submaxillary glands are located under the jawbone.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the submaxillary area during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The submaxillary position of the necklace made it hard to wear comfortably.
meanings.sent4: Her submaxillary thoughts were hidden beneath a smile.
meanings.sent5: The submaxillary shadow cast by the tree created a cool spot on the ground.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the area beneath the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The submaxillary region is sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent2: He felt pain in the submaxillary region after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The submaxillary scarf kept her warm on chilly days.
meanings.sent4: His submaxillary voice trembled with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The submaxillary sensation of the cold metal on his skin sent shivers down his spine.
